page.title: 08AN AVERAGE DAY OF AN O.A.P.
page.content: Mr.and Mrs. C. live on the Mitcham Road estate and own their own house.Income_pension,part_time cleaning job. They usually get up at 8 a.m,wash and dress,do housework or some work in the garden.Then Mrs.C. goes to the local shops to buy some food.She returns and makes the dinner.After the meal,she does a little bit of gardening,then gets ready for a small cleaning job at the nearby Philips Factory.Arrives there about 5.30pm,leaves at 7pm,and arrives home at 7.30.Then Mr. and Mrs. C.have something to eat and watch television before going to bed. Once a week Mrs.C.uses her bus pass(obtained from the post office),to go to Top Rank Bingo with her sister.They come home from bingo at about 9pm.
